resources.“An appreciative listener is always stim: “An appreciative listener is always stimulating.” ― Agatha Christie
resources.“I never miss a good chance to shut up.”: “I never miss a good chance to shut up.” ― James Patterson
resources.“It takes two to speak the truth - one t: “It takes two to speak the truth - one to speak and another to hear.” ― Henry David Thoreau
resources.“Listen very carefully, I shall say zis: “Listen very carefully, I shall say zis only once.” ― Michelle of La Resistance
“Nobody Expects the Spanish Inquisition.” ― Monthy Python
“Shut up, Kyle. Shut your goddamn mouth.” ― Eric Cartman
resources.“Shut up. Just shut up. Shut up.” ― Blac: “Shut up. Just shut up. Shut up.” ― Black Eyed Peas
resources.“Silence is a true friend who never betr: “Silence is a true friend who never betrays.” ― Confucius
resources.“Silence. I keel you!” ― Achmed the dead: “Silence. I keel you!” ― Achmed the dead terrorist
resources.“Talking is a necessity, listening is an: “Talking is a necessity, listening is an art.” ― Goethe
resources.“The art of conversation lies in listeni: “The art of conversation lies in listening” ― Malcolm Forbes
resources.“The word 'listen' contains the same let: “The word 'listen' contains the same letters as the word 'silent'.” ― Alfred Brendel
resources.“We have two ears and one mouth, so we s: “We have two ears and one mouth, so we should listen more than we say.” ― Zeno of Citium
